text: Refuse (o treat If treatment not already underway, then counsel and refer, or Elective Competent: Respect refusal Treat, counsel and get patient to sign a release Emergency: Cannot refuse to treat. Counsel if possible Proxy mandated in writing: the proxy may refuse — respect it Aoun Elective No proxy: Spouse or partner, parent, grandparent, an adult child or brother or sister (in that order) — If they refuse, get a court order Incompetent Certain refusal: respect it but confirm with family that this is what the patient wished Emergency Uncertainty: get legal advice Advanced directive of refusal (sc)
